name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, specializing in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Terraform**. Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and utilizing monitoring tools such as **DataDog**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** to enhance system performance. Strong background in programming with **Python** and **Bash**, and skilled in configuration management using **Ansible**. Experienced in database management with **PostgreSQL** and handling real-time data processing with **Kafka**. Proven ability to deliver high-quality, scalable infrastructure and solutions at industry-leading companies, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
